sentences.en: A creeper was entwined ( a ) round [ about ] the pillar.
sentences.cn: 一根 攀缘 植物缠绕在柱子上.

sentences.en: A graceful creeper along the narrow strip of sward that edged the rice - field on our right.
sentences.cn: 一款典雅的爬草,细剑梢上带著小花,行长在我们右侧的稻田边缘.

sentences.en: Description: Defend your base from the Creeper and fight your way to safety!
sentences.cn: 简介: 在植物的进攻中监守你的阵地,并找到安全的离开方法!

sentences.en: Flourishing creeperVirginia creeper in the midsummer.
sentences.cn: 仲夏时节里茂盛的爬山虎.

sentences.en: I will never learn from the scrambling trumpet creeper.
My foot caught in a creeper and I pitched forward.
sentences.cn: 藤蔓缠住我的脚,使我向前倒下.

sentences.en: Sometimes a particularly good creeper suggests a sleeping dragon and is given that name.
sentences.cn: 有些非常美丽的古藤,看来真象卧龙,便有人称之为“卧龙”.

sentences.en: Step by step, the sleepy creeper crawled into my sleeve to sleep.
sentences.cn: 昏昏欲睡的爬虫一步一步爬进我的袖子里睡觉.

sentences.en: Tendrils may be branched, or unbranched, and may have terminal adhesive disks, as in the creeper.
sentences.cn: 卷须可能具有分枝, 也可能无分枝, 末端还会有吸盘, 例如五叶地锦.

sentences.en: The creeper is growing in towards the gutter, and should be cleared away.
sentences.cn: 蔓草往沟里生长, 应该除掉.

sentences.en: The creeper is growing up the wall.
sentences.cn: 爬山虎正沿着墙往上长.

sentences.en: The Virginia creeper we planted last year has run riot and covered half the wall.
sentences.cn: 我们去年种的五叶地锦乱长一气,现在已爬到半墙高了.

sentences.en: The windows smiled, the door coaxed and beckoned, the creeper blushed confederacy.
sentences.cn: 窗户都微微含笑, 门户都甘言引诱,举手招呼,长春藤也都因为暗中同谋,满面现出赧颜.

words.tran_cn: 爬行的；迟缓的；毛骨悚然的；奉承的
令人毛骨悚然的；爬行的
爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者
爬行；慢慢地移动（creep的现在分词）
爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩
爬行者；[植]匍匐植物；定速运送器
